summary: Build/update an existing /dashboard page to display overview statistic cards derived from existing Publishers, Territories, and Tasks backends.
architectural_notes: Dashboard stats must be computed by querying existing backends: getPublishers (count isActive=true), getTerritories (count status="Checked Out"), getTasks (count isCompleted=false with dueDate compared to current timestamp).
Tasks dueDate is stored as Int timestamp in seconds; Upcoming if dueDate > now, Overdue if dueDate < now.

existing_features.title: Update the existing Dashboard page for the /dashboard route to display four statistic cards in a single row at the top of the page (keeping everything else unchanged).

On the Dashboard page, query the existing backends for publishers, territories, and tasks (using the existing frontend actor/query hooks where available) and compute the four counts based on the following rules: (1) Active Publishers = publishers where isActive == true; (2) Checked Out Territories = territories where status == "Checked Out"; (3) Upcoming Tasks = tasks where isCompleted == false and dueDate > currentTimestampSeconds; (4) Overdue Tasks = tasks where isCompleted == false and dueDate < currentTimestampSeconds. dueDate is an Int timestamp in seconds.

Render the four Dashboard stat cards with the exact labels and color backgrounds: (1) Green background card labeled "Active Publishers"; (2) Blue background card labeled "Checked Out Territories"; (3) Orange background card labeled "Upcoming Tasks"; (4) Red background card labeled "Overdue Tasks". Each card must show the computed number prominently, with the label text below it.

Update routing/navigation so that the Dashboard page is accessible at /dashboard as specified, without breaking existing navigation. If the app currently uses / for Dashboard navigation, ensure users can still reach the Dashboard from the sidebar and the route configuration aligns with /dashboard.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update existing /dashboard route to show four overview stat cards (Active Publishers, Checked Out Territories, Upcoming Tasks, Overdue Tasks) by querying existing backends and counting based on specified conditions and colors.

projectName: Update Dashboard page with overview statistic cards
